name: 弗雷德里克·布罗西耶
name_full: 弗雷德里克·布罗西耶 Frédéric Brossier
introduction: Frédéric Brossier was born in 1992 in Frankfurt am Main, Hesse, Germany, but grew up in Rüsselsheim am Main, Hesse, Germany. He is of German-French Ancestry and grew up bilingual. He is fluent in German (Native Language) , French (Native Language) and English, but also speaks Italian very well. He also owns a Dual Citizenship and is German Citizen and French Citizen at the same time.He lives in Berlin, Berlin, Germany and Potsdam, Brandenburg, Germany.
